verses.name: Proverbs 16:28
verses.text: A froward man soweth strife: and a whisperer separateth chief friends.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:29
verses.text: A violent man enticeth his neighbour, and leadeth him into the way that is not good.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:30
verses.text: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:31
verses.text: The hoary head is a crown of glory, if it be found in the way of righteousness.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:32
verses.text: He that is slow to anger is better than the mighty; and he that ruleth his spirit than he that taketh a city.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:33
verses.text: The lot is cast into the lap; but the whole disposing thereof is of the Lord.
